Detailed Description

A class for the base activation policy interface.

This class is used to indicate that a plug-in is always enabled. It should also be used as the base class for any custom activation policies. See the documentation of DzPlugin for a description of how to easily implement and provide activation policies in a DAZ Studio plug-in.
